title: 75. Treating the Eyes, Lips + Neck: Jan Marini Gives Me a Skincare Consultation.
description:
Welcome back to The Treatment Room podcast! In this week's episode I wanted to share my experience getting a virtual consultation from the legendary Jan Marini of Jan Marini Skin Research. Here's what Jan recommend for me!  

TO SHOP JAN MARINI (free/ fast shipping) email me at: tessaskinconsulting@gmail.com   LINKS My brand: www.freeskinbytessa.com @freeskinbytessa  My podcast: The Treatment Room on Apple + Spotify

This episode is sponsored by Gloss Genius.

  • Sign up here: https://glossgenius.biz/TTR22S-signup
  • Get 50% off for 2 months
